description: This table contains the history of coding status changes for each account coded.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The hospital account ID with related coding status history information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query. Each coding history will have its own line number.

columns.name: CDSTS_HX_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Coding status changed instant - stored in UTC time.  Data will not exist in this column for coding statuses created before UTC instant tracking was enabled for coding history.

columns.name: CDSTS_HX_SVC_STS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the simple visit coding (SVC) completion status when coding status is set by simple visit coding.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Success


Fail

columns.name: CDSTS_HX_ASGN_USER_ID
columns.description: Item to store coding assigned user changes
